review: It does not run on Samsung S4 mini nothing other than youtube. I was pissed and ready to return the next day .  I tried  the S4 . It runs well on S4 and the Tab 3 .  It is made for the Utube.  I use the cast screen feature . Then I ran Kodi to see all sort of movies on big TV. There is lag from time to time due to Wifi . Overall I am satisfied . I am thinking about buying a second one .
author: Thang T. Pham "thang"

review: Was unable to get it to work with my internet provider.  Gave it to someone else with a different internet provider and they love it.
author: Scott

review: it works most of the time.  I have to reboot it often, and every couple of months it seems like I have to factory reset it to get it to work again.  Great device, would be awesome if it worked consistently.
author: James

review: Nice little device.  Fast, fast, fast shipment.  Easy install.
author: jillel85

review: Great product, this is my second one. I have one for my bedroom and one for my living room, good investment…
author: Jerry Eisenhower

review: Netflix will not work in my daughter's room so I bought this now she has netflix and a bunch of the options of watching movies.  Great buy
author: Dawn Pridemore

review: one of the best deals I have made for a long time!! Works perfectly
author: Yariv Ziporin
